message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split, with me taking 60 and you taking 40.  This feels like a good starting point.
Your offer was a bit too greedy for me. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor this time. Consider that the value of the money decreases faster for you than for me in the next round.
Let's find a compromise. I'm willing to reduce my share to 48, giving you 52.  This is closer to your proposal, but still accounts for the faster rate of inflation affecting me.
